text: Vilmos Zsigmond, A.S.C. (June 16, 1930 - January 1, 2016) was a Hungarian- American cinematographer. He was known for his work in Close Encounters of the Third Kind. He won an Academy Award and a BAFTA Award during his career. Zsigmond was born in Szeged, Hungary. He became an American citizen in 1962.
